channel.title: Coke Bottle
channel.description:
Lol, my second model From scratch. Tell me what you think :p I'm sure this could be used for something server-sided, be creative!
Metasequoia model: [IMG]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb269/frogboy336/metcoke.png[/img]
In-game models: [IMG]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb269/frogboy336/cokemodels.png[/img]
[url=http://www.MegaShare.com/546768]Models[/url]
Ints are [code] if(i == 8012) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Hold";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14570; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14569;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14569;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Coke Bottle";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Coke Bottle ftw".getBytes();//examine info }[/code]

item.title: Coke Bottle
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

[quote=“Mod Foxen, post:10, topic:250143”]I added the Coke Bottle thing I think. I followed these steps.

  1. I added the ints to class8.java:
    if(i == 8012) {
        class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
        class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Hold";//New option
        class8.anInt174 = 14570; //Model ID // 20233
        class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller
        class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
        class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
        class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
        class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
        class8.anInt165 = 14569;//male wearing //
        class8.anInt200 = 14569;//female wearing // 
        class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //
        class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // 
        class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
        class8.aString170 = "Coke Bottle";//Name of the new item
        class8.aByteArray178 = "Coke Bottle ftw".getBytes();//examine info
    }
  1. I added it to item.cfg:
item = 8012	Coke_Bottle	Coke Bottle FTW!	1000000	1000000	809290.5918252946	58	69	-2	0	0	3	2	0	0	71	0
  1. Added it to shops.cfg (In zaffs shop):
shop = 24	Zaff's_Magic_Gear			2	2	1387	500	4089	500	4091	500	4093	500	4095	500	4097	500	4099	500	4101	500	4103	500	4105	500	4107	500	4109	500	4111	500	4113	500	4115	500	4117	500	6918	500	6916	500	6924	500	6922	500	6920	500	579	500	577	500	1011	500	2579	500	4675	500	[b]8012	1[/b]
  1. I compiled My Client and Server.
  2. This is what happend:

Im wondering if I forgot any steps or if I made an error somewhere.[/quote]
You have to download the models into your models folder in your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Coke Bottle
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

@Foxen;
In-game type
“add model 14570”
“add model 14569”

Also, this is not a cmd in case you type the colons in front of it ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Coke Bottle
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I added the Coke Bottle thing I think. I followed these steps.

  1. I added the ints to class8.java:
    if(i == 8012) {
        class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
        class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Hold";//New option
        class8.anInt174 = 14570; //Model ID // 20233
        class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller
        class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
        class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
        class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
        class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
        class8.anInt165 = 14569;//male wearing //
        class8.anInt200 = 14569;//female wearing // 
        class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //
        class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // 
        class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
        class8.aString170 = "Coke Bottle";//Name of the new item
        class8.aByteArray178 = "Coke Bottle ftw".getBytes();//examine info
    }
  1. I added it to item.cfg:
item = 8012	Coke_Bottle	Coke Bottle FTW!	1000000	1000000	809290.5918252946	58	69	-2	0	0	3	2	0	0	71	0
  1. Added it to shops.cfg (In zaffs shop):
shop = 24	Zaff's_Magic_Gear			2	2	1387	500	4089	500	4091	500	4093	500	4095	500	4097	500	4099	500	4101	500	4103	500	4105	500	4107	500	4109	500	4111	500	4113	500	4115	500	4117	500	6918	500	6916	500	6924	500	6922	500	6920	500	579	500	577	500	1011	500	2579	500	4675	500	[b]8012	1[/b]
  1. I compiled My Client and Server.
  2. This is what happend:

Im wondering if I forgot any steps or if I made an error somewhere.

Read full topic
